Package org.radarbase.management.web.rest

Class RoleResource

java.lang.Object
org.radarbase.management.web.rest.RoleResource
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api") public class RoleResource extends Object
REST controller for managing Role.

  • Method Details

    • createRole

      @PostMapping("/roles") @Secured("ROLE_SYS_ADMIN") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RoleDTO> createRole(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid RoleDTO roleDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      POST /Roles : Create a new role.
      Parameters:
      roleDto - the roleDto to create
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 201 (Created) and with body the new RoleDTO, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the Role has already an ID
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • updateRole

      @PutMapping("/roles") @Secured("ROLE_SYS_ADMIN") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RoleDTO> updateRole(@Valid @RequestBody @Valid RoleDTO roleDto) throws URISyntaxException, org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      PUT /roles : Updates an existing role.
      Parameters:
      roleDto - the roleDto to update
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the updated roleDto, or with status 400 (Bad Request) if the roleDto is not valid, or with status 500 (Internal Server Error) if the roleDto couldnt be updated
      Throws:
      URISyntaxException - if the Location URI syntax is incorrect
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getAllRoles

      @GetMapping("/roles") public List<RoleDTO> getAllRoles() throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /roles : get all the roles.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of roles in body
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException

    • getAllAdminRoles

      @GetMapping("/roles/admin") @Secured("ROLE_SYS_ADMIN") public List<RoleDTO> getAllAdminRoles()
      GET /roles : get all the roles.
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and the list of roles in body

    • getRole

      @GetMapping("/roles/{projectName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}/{authorityName:^[_\'.@A-Za-z0-9- ]*$}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<RoleDTO> getRole(@PathVariable String projectName, @PathVariable String authorityName) throws org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
      GET /roles/:projectName/:authorityName : get the role of the specified project and authority.
      Parameters:
      projectName - The project name
      authorityName - The authority name
      Returns:
      the ResponseEntity with status 200 (OK) and with body the roleDTO, or with status 404 (Not Found)
      Throws:
      org.radarbase.management.security.NotAuthorizedException
